mapper.select: SELECT ATTEND_ID, EMP_ID, TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATTEND_DATE, CLOCKIN, CLOCKOUT, TOTAL_TIME, ATTEND_TYPE, USE_EXTRA_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE ORDER BY ATTEND_ID ASC

SELECT ATTEND_ID, EMP_ID, TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATTEND_DATE, CLOCKIN, CLOCKOUT, TOTAL_TIME, ATTEND_TYPE, USE_EXTRA_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) ORDER BY ATTEND_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE (ATTEND_ID, EMP_ID, ATTEND_DATE, CLOCKIN) VALUES (ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empId}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET CLOCKOUT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND CLOCKOUT IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isClockedIn FROM DUAL
SELECT CLOCKIN FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
SELECT CLOCKOUT FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET TOTAL_TIME = FLOOR((CLOCKOUT - CLOCKIN) * 1440) WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT ATTEND_TYPE FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET ATTEND_TYPE = #{attendType} WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET USE_EXTRA_TIME = #{useExtraTime} WHERE TRIM(EMP_ID) = TRIM(#{empId}) AND ATTEND_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
